medium: Iron, reptile hide, copper, brass, plant fibers, animal hide, wood
title: Knife and Sheath
description: Knife with pointed, slightly flaring blade; incised zigzag down center of blade on each side; reptile hide at bottom of handle with section of copper and iron (?) wires topped with a metal shaft; sheath made of wood covered with hide with woven plant fibers at top and bottom
creditline: Gift of Adrienne H. and Robert J. White
